Headline: #22 Clark, #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop
ShortDescription: NB 22 Clark, 151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark, #151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed Oak Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Oak Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Oak Park due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
